Sebastian Mendo Lopez

Game created by Sebastian Mendo Lopez

Story

You are Kobe Bryant the lengendary NBA Player. He entered the NBA directly from high school and won five NBA championships. Bryant was an 18-time All-Star, 15-time member of the All-NBA Team, 12-time member of the All-Defensive Team, and the 2008 NBA Most Valuable Player (MVP).

How to Play

Press Space to jump and avoid defender. As the game progresses it gets harder and harder. There will be a score counter on the top right which will tell your score
